text: Terrifier 3 is an American Christmas slasher movie written and directed by Damien Leone. It stars Lauren LaVera, Elliott Fullam, David Howard Thornton, and Samantha Scaffidi. The movie is a sequel to Terrifier 2 (2023). The third movie is about Art the Clown and Sienna Shaw. The movie was released on October 11, 2024 to positive reviews. ==References== Category:2024 movies Category:2020s horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies directed by Damien Leone
title: Terrifier 3
